title: The vvorlde possessed with deuils conteinyng three dialogues. 1. Of the Deuill let loose. 2. Of blacke deuils. 3. Of white deuils. And of the commyng of Iesus Christe to iudgement, a verie necessarie and comfortable discourse for these miserable and daungerous daies.
author: Viret, Pierre, 1511-1571.
publisher: [By John Kingston] for Ihon Perin, and are to be sold in Paules Churchyard at the signe of the Angell,
notes: Issued with "The second part of the demoniacke worlde" (London, 1583). The two parts together are a translation of part 2 of: Le monde a l'empire et le monde demoniacle.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
